description.narrative: "The Pembina Foundation mission is to produce relevant information for sustainable energy solutions, and to ensure Canada leads with a clean and low carbon economy. They advocate for climate action and provide technical analysis for effective public policies, such as the national climate plan. With this proposed grant, Pembina will support for the adoption and implement of an ambitious Clean Fuel Standard. The standard as proposed would generate 30 million tonnes of greenhouse gas emissions reductions by 2030, and it will help the market for low carbon fuels in North America. "
